channel.title: Uncategorized on Mike Perham
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Mike Perham

item.title: The Reconciliation Step
item.description: A lot of people ask me “How can I guarantee that a batch of jobs finished successfully?” Here’s the sad fact: you can’t. 99% of the time things go perfectly but there will always be some small percentage that fail for a myriad of reasons: hardware failure, software bug, thunderstorms in the cloud.
